explains: adj. 短小精悍的；衣冠楚楚的；整洁的；整齐的
n. （Dapper）人名；（英）达珀；（意）达珀尔；（德）达佩尔

sentences.en: At the words, the door opened and a dapper little old man came in.
sentences.cn: 听到这话，门开了，一个衣冠楚楚的小老头走了进来。

sentences.en: A dapper gentleman of about sixty stepped into the room and faced us.
sentences.cn: 一位60岁左右、身姿矫健的男子走进房间，面向我们。

sentences.en: And the tools to tap and manipulate all this data can be found at sites like Dapper and Kapow.
sentences.cn: 所有这些工具的数据来源都可以在数据网站上得到，如Dapper和Kapow。
